## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT2G31210](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT2G31210)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>bHLH091</u>
- **Gene Name:** Basic Helix Loop Helix Protein 91
- **Description:**   basic helix-loop-helix (bHLH) DNA-binding superfamily protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2042556
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*

## Transcripts:
   -  [AT2G31210.1](https://www.arabidopsis.org/gene?name=AT2G31210.1)

## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [bhlh010 bhlh091]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Aborted pollen occasionally observed.  Anther size and number of pollen grains obviously reduced. Tapetum does not develop normally.
   - [bhlh010 bhlh091]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Normal vegetative growth and floral organs.
